## Checklist
- [ ] **No Withdrawal/Payment Flows**: I have NOT added any withdrawal or in-app payment logic.
- [ ] **Caps Enforced**: I have verified that 4k contribution / 500k wallet caps are respected (if applicable).
- [ ] **Membership Gating**: I have verified that logic/UI requires group membership.
- [ ] **Localization**: All user-facing strings are wrapped in `intl` or equivalent (no hardcoded strings).
- [ ] **Dark Mode**: Checked on dark mode (if UI changed).
- [ ] **PII Safety**: No personal data (phones/emails) is logged.
